  specialized related to the area of science and medicine that is concerned with hearing and balance: an audiological examination I'm scheduled to have an audiological screening on Thursday. See
audiology
More examplesFewer examplesEven though hearing aids are fantastic pieces of audiological engineering and equipment, patients often don't like them.The extent of a child’s hearing impairment may not be recognized so an audiological assessment is very important. A friend of mine is an audiological technician.
